sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_DISPLAY ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE AS PRT_FCLTY_SE ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD ,T1.LA_CRDNT ,T1.LO_CRDNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PRT_FCLTY_AR,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS PRT_FCLTY_AR ,T1.LAT ,T1.LNG ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE) AS PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM005',T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD,'1') AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_NM ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC_LNM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002',T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM ,TO_CHAR(T2.BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.FLAW_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FLAW_END_DT ,T2.BASE_FMT AS BASE_FMT ,T2.STRCT_FMT AS STRCT_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ARCH_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS ARCH_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PLOT_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS PLOT_AR ,T2.MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS AS MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ISD_PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS ISD_PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OSD_PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS OSD_PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS PRK_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ISD_PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS ISD_PRK_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OSD_PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS OSD_PRK_CNT ,T2.EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC AS EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC ,T2.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD AS VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD ,T2.WRT_TANK_LOC AS WRT_TANK_LOC ,T2.SBT_LOC AS SBT_LOC ,T2.OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC AS OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC ,T2.SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC AS SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_PSNGR,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_PSNGR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_CARGO,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_CARGO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_EMGCY,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_EMGCY ,T2.LIFT_OPER_MTHD AS LIFT_OPER_MTHD ,T2.CLNG_ENNC AS CLNG_ENNC ,T2.CLNG_SRC AS CLNG_SRC ,T2.HTNG_ENNC AS HTNG_ENNC ,T2.HTNG_SRC AS HTNG_SRC ,T2.SPICTANK_FMT AS SPICTANK_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA ,T2.FCG AS FCG ,T2.ITR AS ITR ,T2.CEIL AS CEIL ,T2.ROOF AS ROOF ,T2.ROOF_WTPRF AS ROOF_WTPRF ,T2.PLAN_CNST_NM AS PLAN_CNST_NM ,T2.PLAN_EXC_CMPNY AS PLAN_EXC_CMPNY ,TO_CHAR(T2.PLAN_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.PLAN_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_END_DT ,T2.CNSTRCT_CNST_NM AS CNSTRCT_CNST_NM ,T2.CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY AS CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY ,TO_CHAR(T2.CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.CNSTRCT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_END_DT ,T2.RM AS RM ,T2.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T2.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T2.LOC AS LOC ,T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD AS ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM(T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD) AS ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM ,NVL(T2.LOC,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB)) AS PRT_FCLTY_LOC ,(CASE WHEN T2.ROWID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS FCLTY_SPEC_EXIST_YN FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'A'
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #sFcltsMngNo#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND (T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%' OR T2.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%')
AND T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#
ORDER BY T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ASC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD ASC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ASC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F ( BLD_DT ,FLAW_END_DT ,BASE_FMT ,STRCT_FMT ,AR ,ARCH_AR ,PLOT_AR ,MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS ,PRK_AR ,ISD_PRK_AR ,OSD_PRK_AR ,PRK_CNT ,ISD_PRK_CNT ,OSD_PRK_CNT ,EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC ,VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD ,WRT_TANK_LOC ,SBT_LOC ,OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC ,SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC ,LIFT_CNT_PSNGR ,LIFT_CNT_CARGO ,LIFT_CNT_EMGCY ,LIFT_OPER_MTHD ,CLNG_ENNC ,CLNG_SRC ,HTNG_ENNC ,HTNG_SRC ,SPICTANK_FMT ,ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA ,FCG ,ITR ,CEIL ,ROOF ,ROOF_WTPRF ,PLAN_CNST_NM ,PLAN_EXC_CMPNY ,PLAN_BEGIN_DT ,PLAN_END_DT ,CNSTRCT_CNST_NM ,CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY ,CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT ,CNSTRCT_END_DT ,RM ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,FCLTS_MNG_NO ,LOC ,ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD ) VALUES ( TO_DATE(#bldDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#flawEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,#baseFmt# ,#strctFmt# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ar#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#archAr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#plotAr#,',','')),0) ,#mainUsagePrpos# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkAr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkAr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkAr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkCnt#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkCnt#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkCnt#,',','')),0) ,#exhaustDuctEnnc# ,#vntltnArcndtMthd# ,#wrtTankLoc# ,#sbtLoc# ,#oilSavefcltyLoc# ,#swgClupfcltyLoc# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntPsngr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntCargo#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntEmgcy#,',','')),0) ,#liftOperMthd# ,#clngEnnc# ,#clngSrc# ,#htngEnnc# ,#htngSrc# ,#spictankFmt# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyLeadInCapa#,',','')),0) ,#fcg# ,#itr# ,#ceil# ,#roof# ,#roofWtprf# ,#planCnstNm# ,#planExcCmpny# ,TO_DATE(#planBeginDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#planEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,#cnstrctCnstNm# ,#cnstrctExcCmpny# ,TO_DATE(#cnstrctBeginDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#cnstrctEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,#rm# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#fcltsMngNo# ,#loc# ,#archFcltsClCd# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F SET BLD_DT = TO_DATE(#bldDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,FLAW_END_DT = TO_DATE(#flawEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,BASE_FMT = #baseFmt# ,STRCT_FMT = #strctFmt# ,AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#ar#,',','')),0) ,ARCH_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#archAr#,',','')),0) ,PLOT_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#plotAr#,',','')),0) ,MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS = #mainUsagePrpos# ,PRK_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkAr#,',','')),0) ,ISD_PRK_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkAr#,',','')),0) ,OSD_PRK_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkAr#,',','')),0) ,PRK_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prkCnt#,',','')),0) ,ISD_PRK_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#isdPrkCnt#,',','')),0) ,OSD_PRK_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#osdPrkCnt#,',','')),0) ,EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC = #exhaustDuctEnnc# ,VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD = #vntltnArcndtMthd# ,WRT_TANK_LOC = #wrtTankLoc# ,SBT_LOC = #sbtLoc# ,OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC = #oilSavefcltyLoc# ,SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC = #swgClupfcltyLoc# ,LIFT_CNT_PSNGR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntPsngr#,',','')),0) ,LIFT_CNT_CARGO = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntCargo#,',','')),0) ,LIFT_CNT_EMGCY = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#liftCntEmgcy#,',','')),0) ,LIFT_OPER_MTHD = #liftOperMthd# ,CLNG_ENNC = #clngEnnc# ,CLNG_SRC = #clngSrc# ,HTNG_ENNC = #htngEnnc# ,HTNG_SRC = #htngSrc# ,SPICTANK_FMT = #spictankFmt# ,ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyLeadInCapa#,',','')),0) ,FCG = #fcg# ,ITR = #itr# ,CEIL = #ceil# ,ROOF = #roof# ,ROOF_WTPRF = #roofWtprf# ,PLAN_CNST_NM = #planCnstNm# ,PLAN_EXC_CMPNY = #planExcCmpny# ,PLAN_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#planBeginDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PLAN_END_DT = TO_DATE(#planEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,CNSTRCT_CNST_NM = #cnstrctCnstNm# ,CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY = #cnstrctExcCmpny# ,CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#cnstrctBeginDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,CNSTRCT_END_DT = TO_DATE(#cnstrctEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,RM = #rm# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,LOC = #loc# ,ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #archFcltsClCd# WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_DISPLAY ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB ,T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AS GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE AS PRT_FCLTY_SE ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD AS PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD ,T1.LA_CRDNT ,T1.LO_CRDNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.PRT_FCLTY_AR,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS PRT_FCLTY_AR ,T1.LAT ,T1.LNG ,TO_CHAR(T1.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_NO ,T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,GAM_GET_PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE) AS PRT_FCLTY_SE_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM005',T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD) AS GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM(T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) AS FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T1.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD,'1') AS PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_NM ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD ,T3.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC_LNM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002',T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM ,TO_CHAR(T2.BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.FLAW_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FLAW_END_DT ,T2.BASE_FMT AS BASE_FMT ,T2.STRCT_FMT AS STRCT_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ARCH_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS ARCH_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PLOT_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS PLOT_AR ,T2.MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS AS MAIN_USAGE_PRPOS ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ISD_PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS ISD_PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OSD_PRK_AR,0),'9,999,999,990.00')) AS OSD_PRK_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS PRK_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ISD_PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS ISD_PRK_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.OSD_PRK_CNT,0),'99,990')) AS OSD_PRK_CNT ,T2.EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC AS EXHAUST_DUCT_ENNC ,T2.VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD AS VNTLTN_ARCNDT_MTHD ,T2.WRT_TANK_LOC AS WRT_TANK_LOC ,T2.SBT_LOC AS SBT_LOC ,T2.OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC AS OIL_SAVEFCLTY_LOC ,T2.SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC AS SWG_CLUPFCLTY_LOC ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_PSNGR,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_PSNGR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_CARGO,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_CARGO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.LIFT_CNT_EMGCY,0),'99,990')) AS LIFT_CNT_EMGCY ,T2.LIFT_OPER_MTHD AS LIFT_OPER_MTHD ,T2.CLNG_ENNC AS CLNG_ENNC ,T2.CLNG_SRC AS CLNG_SRC ,T2.HTNG_ENNC AS HTNG_ENNC ,T2.HTNG_SRC AS HTNG_SRC ,T2.SPICTANK_FMT AS SPICTANK_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA,0),'99,999,990.00')) AS ELCTY_LEAD_IN_CAPA ,T2.FCG AS FCG ,T2.ITR AS ITR ,T2.CEIL AS CEIL ,T2.ROOF AS ROOF ,T2.ROOF_WTPRF AS ROOF_WTPRF ,T2.PLAN_CNST_NM AS PLAN_CNST_NM ,T2.PLAN_EXC_CMPNY AS PLAN_EXC_CMPNY ,TO_CHAR(T2.PLAN_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.PLAN_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_END_DT ,T2.CNSTRCT_CNST_NM AS CNSTRCT_CNST_NM ,T2.CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY AS CNSTRCT_EXC_CMPNY ,TO_CHAR(T2.CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(T2.CNSTRCT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNSTRCT_END_DT ,T2.RM AS RM ,T2.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T2.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T2.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T2.LOC AS LOC ,T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD AS ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD ,GAM_GET_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM(T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD) AS ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM ,NVL(T2.LOC,GAM_GET_LOCPLC_LNM_SUB(T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM,T3.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB)) AS PRT_FCLTY_LOC ,(CASE WHEN T2.ROWID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS FCLTY_SPEC_EXIST_YN FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#

SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_COUNT ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.AR),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_AR ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.ARCH_AR),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_ARCH_AR ,TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(T2.PLOT_AR),0),'999,999,999,999,999') AS SUM_PLOT_AR FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ARCH_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'A'
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sPrtFcltyNm# || '%'
AND (T3.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%' OR T2.LOC LIKE '%' || #sLoc# || '%')
AND T2.ARCH_FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ)),0) + 1,'0000')) AS MAX_GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 WHERE T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F SET PRT_FCLTY_NM = #prtFcltyNm# ,PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD = #prtFcltyStndrd# ,PRT_FCLTY_UNIT = #prtFcltyUnit# ,PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyInstlDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyChangeDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD = #prtFcltyMngEntrpsCd# ,PRT_FCLTY_GIS_CD = #prtFcltyGisCd# ,LA_CRDNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#laCrdnt#,',','')),0) ,LO_CRDNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#loCrdnt#,',','')),0) ,PRT_FCLTY_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#prtFcltyAr#,',','')),0) ,LAT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lat#,',','')),0) ,LNG = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#lng#,',','')),0) ,PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT = TO_DATE(#prtFcltyExprDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT = #prtPrtFcltyCnt# ,PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER = #prtPrtFcltyMnger# ,GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB = #gisPrtFcltyCdSub# ,FCLTS_MNG_NO = #fcltsMngNo# ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# WHERE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = #gisPrtFcltyCd# AND GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ = #gisPrtFcltySeq# AND GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND PRT_FCLTY_SE = #prtFcltySe#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ATCH_FILE_SEQ,0),'000')) AS ATCH_FILE_SEQ ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SJ AS ATCH_FILE_SJ ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC AS ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL AS ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SE AS ATCH_FILE_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT ,GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(T1.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo# ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_SEQ ASC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F ( FCLTS_MNG_NO ,ATCH_FILE_SEQ ,ATCH_FILE_SJ ,ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,ATCH_FILE_SE ,ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT ) SELECT #atchFileFcltsMngNo# ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo#) ,#atchFileSj# ,#atchFileNmLogic# ,#atchFileNmPhysicl# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#atchFileSe# ,SYSDATE FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F SET ATCH_FILE_SJ = #atchFileSj# ,ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC = #atchFileNmLogic# ,ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL = #atchFileNmPhysicl# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,ATCH_FILE_SE = #atchFileSe# ,ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileSeq#,',','')),0)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo# AND ATCH_FILE_SEQ = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileSeq#,',','')),0)
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO AS ATCH_FILE_FCLTS_MNG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ATCH_FILE_SEQ,0),'000')) AS ATCH_FILE_SEQ ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SJ AS ATCH_FILE_SJ ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC AS ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC ,T1.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL AS ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T1.ATCH_FILE_SE AS ATCH_FILE_SE ,TO_CHAR(T1.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT ,GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(T1.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F T1 WHERE T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo# AND T1.ATCH_FILE_SEQ = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#atchFileSeq#,',','')),0)
SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(T1.ATCH_FILE_SEQ),0) + 1,'000')) AS MAX_ATCH_FILE_SEQ FROM FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F T1 WHERE T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO = #atchFileFcltsMngNo#
SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
SELECT ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = #sFcltsClCd#
SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD ,FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_JOB_SE = 'A' AND LEAF_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FCLTS_CL_CD

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.DIR_NO,0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS DIR_NO ,T1.DIR_NM AS DIR_NM ,T1.DIR_PATH AS DIR_PATH ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.DIR_UPPER_NO,0),'9,999,999,999,999,990')) AS DIR_UPPER_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.DEPTH_SORT,0),'990')) AS DEPTH_SORT ,T1.LEAF_YN AS LEAF_YN ,T1.FCLTS_JOB_SE AS DIR_FCLTS_JOB_SE ,T1.REG_USR AS REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F T1 WHERE T1.DIR_NO = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')),0)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ATCH_FILE_DIR_F ( DIR_NO ,DIR_NM ,DIR_PATH ,DIR_UPPER_NO ,DEPTH_SORT ,LEAF_YN ,FCLTS_JOB_SE ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')),0) ,#dirNm# ,#dirPath# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#depthSort#,',','')),0) ,#leafYn# ,#dirFcltsJobSe# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ATCH_FILE_DIR_F SET DIR_NM = #dirNm# ,DIR_PATH = #dirPath# ,DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')) ,DEPTH_SORT = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#depthSort#,',','')) ,LEAF_YN = #leafYn# ,FCLTS_JOB_SE = #dirFcltsJobSe# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))

UPDATE ATCH_FILE_DIR_F SET LEAF_YN = ( SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',','')) AND DIR_NO <> TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',','')) ) WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirUpperNo#,',',''))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))

DELETE FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO IN ( SELECT DIR_NO FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO > TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))) START WITH DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))) CONNECT BY DIR_UPPER_NO = PRIOR DIR_NO )
sqlMap.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ATCH_FILE_DIR_SEQ.NEXTVAL) AS NEW_DIR_NO FROM DUAL

SELECT COUNT(*) AS LOWER_DATA_CNT FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO IN ( SELECT DIR_NO FROM ATCH_FILE_DIR_F WHERE DIR_NO > TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))) START WITH DIR_UPPER_NO = TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#dirNo#,',',''))) CONNECT BY DIR_UPPER_NO = PRIOR DIR_NO )
